column1: Little Goat Diner////I used to be a regular for breakfast snacks and a coffee in the morning. had scones to parfaits everything was good
column2: but very over priced. There isn't much on the street that is open at that time so choices are limited. I still have it on my list to visit for a sit down meal
column4: but I would probably take the walk to colombo or starbucks for just a coffee fix.
